executive_summary: EARLIEST CONVERSATION in sample (Feb 2023, one month before Prayer Times). Educational framework design work: PERMAH well-being, universal skills assessment, Habits of Mind, Skills Builder. Mentions 'Bloom' training module on business scaling. Conversation continued over 9 MONTHS (Feb→Dec 2023), showing it was reference material. Reveals educational/facilitation domain existed BEFORE faith-tech integration.
significance: EARLIEST EVIDENCE - Shows educational framework interests predate Prayer Times (March 2023). Educational mission is foundational, not emergent.
